Date: January 05, 2025

Source: News18

The highly-anticipated trailer of Himesh Reshammiya starrer Badass Ravi Kumar has been unveiled and is taking social media by storm. This retro action musical is a tribute to classic Bollywood, featuring high-octane action and memorable characters.

  • The trailer showcases Himesh Reshammiya as a chainsaw-wielding hero fighting villains.
  • Prabhu Deva plays the main antagonist, while Kriti Kulhari is the female lead.
  • The trailer also includes a nod to Himesh's earlier song 'Tandoori Nights' with a new song 'Tandoori Days.'
  • Highlights include 80s nostalgia with dramatic action and engaging dialogues written by Bunty Rathore.
  • Directed by Keith Gomes, the film is set for release on February 7, 2025.

This trailer exemplifies the spirit of retro Bollywood and builds excitement for its upcoming release.

Baby John box office collection day 12: Is Varun Dhawan, Keerthy Suresh, Wamiqa Gabbi film a flop? - DNA India
summary:
Baby John box office collection day 12: Is Varun Dhawan, Keerthy Suresh, Wamiqa Gabbi film a flop?

Publication Date: January 5, 2024

Source: DNA India

An adaptation of Atlee's 2016 Tamil hit Theri, Baby John has turned out to be one of the biggest Bollywood flops.

  • Released on December 25, 2023, Baby John features Varun Dhawan, Keerthy Suresh, and Wamiqa Gabbi.
  • The film earned Rs 37.70 crore net in India in its first 11 days.
  • On its 12th day, it collected just 90 lakh, totaling Rs 38.60 crore.
  • Worldwide, the film has grossed close to Rs 60 crore against a massive budget of Rs 180 crore.
  • Placed among the biggest Bollywood flops of 2024.
“The moviegoers are choosing Pushpa 2: The Rule and the animated musical Mufasa: The Lion King over Baby John in this festive season.”

In conclusion, Baby John has failed to attract audiences and has been overshadowed by other films during its release.
newTitle: Baby John box office collection day 12: Is Varun Dhawan, Keerthy Suresh, Wamiqa Gabbi film a flop?

Yeh Jaawani Hai Deewani Re-Release Opening Weekend Box Office: Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone film racing towards Rs 200 crore club - PINKVILLA
summary:
Yeh Jaawani Hai Deewani Re-Release Opening Weekend Box Office: Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone Film Approaching Rs 200 Crore Mark

Published on: January 05, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

The re-release of Yeh Jaawani Hai Deewani saw significant audience demand, leading to an increase in showings and impressive box office returns during its opening weekend.

  • The film re-released on approximately 700 shows, expanding to over 2100 shows by Sunday.
  • Collected Rs 6.50 crore over the opening weekend, bringing total collections to Rs 185.95 crore.
  • Initially released in 2013, the film previously earned Rs 178 crore.
  • Friday opening was Rs 1.10 crore, with a jump to Rs 3.20 crore on Sunday.
  • The film is expected to enter the Rs 200 crore club if current trends continue.
“The success of YJHD in re-release also emphasizes the importance of popular music in the world of movies.”

With a stellar performance at the box office, the re-release of Yeh Jaawani Hai Deewani signifies a strong demand for romantic comedies, suggesting a shift in audience preferences towards this genre over action-heavy films.
newTitle: Yeh Jaawani Hai Deewani Re-Release Opening Weekend Box Office: Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone Film Approaching Rs 200 Crore Mark

title: Ananth Sriram Criticize Sr NTR and Ashwini Dutt?.. - Greatandhra
summary:
Ananth Sriram's Controversial Critique of Sr NTR and Ashwini Dutt

Publication Date: Not Provided

Source: Not Provided

Ananth Sriram, a prominent Tollywood lyricist and Hindutva advocate, recently criticized the portrayal of Hindu mythology in the film industry, particularly targeting figures like Sr NTR and Ashwini Dutt, albeit indirectly.

  • Ananth Sriram spoke at a VHP meeting in Vijayawada, attended by many saffron-clad swamijis and sadhus.
  • He accused a Krishna district director and producer of distorting Hindu mythology.
  • Specifically, he criticized the film 'Kalki' for depicting Karna more heroically than Arjuna.
  • Sriram expressed his commitment to Hindutva and called for a boycott of films misrepresenting Hindu mythology.
  • Critics have pointed out the inconsistencies in Sriram's past works regarding Hindu themes.
“I call a spade a spade.” - Ananth Sriram

Sriram's criticisms have sparked debate regarding the representation of Hindu mythology in cinema and his unexpected stance against revered figures in the industry.
newTitle: Ananth Sriram's Controversial Critique of Sr NTR and Ashwini Dutt

summary:
JYP’s New Boy Group KickFlip Reveals Member Profiles And Debut Schedule

Publication Date: January 6, 2025 | Source: Soompi

On January 6, JYP Entertainment officially introduced the seven members of their rookie boy group KickFlip and unveiled the schedule for their upcoming debut. KickFlip will make their official debut with their first mini album on January 20 at 6 p.m. KST.

  • The seven members of KickFlip include Kyehoon, Amaru, Donghwa, Juwang, Minje, Keiju, and Donghyeon.
  • The pre-release song “Umm Great” has already been launched.
  • The full debut mini album is set to release on January 20, 2025.
  • Member profiles with birthdates were shared, showcasing each member's individual images.
“Are you excited for KickFlip’s debut? Check out their pre-release music video for 'Umm Great' here!”

This marks an important step for JYP Entertainment as they introduce a new generation of talent into the K-Pop scene.
newTitle: JYP’s New Boy Group KickFlip Unveils Member Profiles and Debut Schedule

title: Munmun Dutta recalls how she got Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah; says 'I was 17 and I had done just one show' - The Times of India
summary:
Munmun Dutta recalls how she got Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah; says 'I was 17 and I had done just one show'

Date: Jan 5, 2025

Source: ETimes.in

Munmun Dutta shared her experiences on cooking for Farah Khan and reminisced about her journey to becoming a part of the popular show Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah.

  • Munmun prepared an authentic Bengali meal for Farah Khan.
  • She revealed that she got her role in Taarak Mehta through auditions at the age of 17.
  • She reflected on her first show 'Hum Sab Baraati', which was her initial acting experience.
  • Munmun expressed her admiration for Shah Rukh Khan and shared anecdotes from her experience working with him.
  • She discussed her transition to vegetarianism and her early struggles in the industry.
“I feel very lucky, and we, as the Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah team, always believe we are blessed because Shah Rukh sir holds us in high regard.”

Munmun's journey highlights her determination and the support she received along the way, emphasizing the significance of her experiences in shaping her career in the television industry.
newTitle: Munmun Dutta Reflects on Her Journey to Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
